name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Sarah is a certified personal trainer with over 5 years of experience helping clients achieve their fitness goals. She specializes in strength training and functional movement.
areas_of_focus: Strength training, Functional movement, Weight loss, Injury prevention
certification: Certified Personal Trainer, CPR First Aid

name: Mike Chen
bio: Mike is passionate about helping clients build strength and confidence through proper training techniques and nutrition guidance.
areas_of_focus: Strength and conditioning, Nutrition coaching, Athletic performance

name: Emily Rodriguez
bio: Emily brings mindfulness and movement together through her yoga practice, helping clients find balance in their fitness journey.

name: David Kim
bio: David specializes in high-intensity training and helps clients push their limits while maintaining proper form and safety.
areas_of_focus: High-intensity training, Cardio fitness, Weight loss
